issue.title: accounts.frame.io
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://accounts.frame.io/welcome?auth_callback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.frame.io%2Fauth%2Fcallback&redirect_path=%2F](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Faccounts.frame.io%2Fwelcome%3Fauth_callback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.frame.io%252Fauth%252Fcallback%26redirect_path%3D%252F) ### Comment > I switched from using Brave brower to Edge today and I was all of the sudden unable to login to www.frame.io. after putting in my credentials, the page just reloads and never logs in. I opened an InPrivate tab and was able to log in just fine. I turned off all extensions and then one by one turned on the extensions and I was able to login fine until enabling Adguard. Once Adguard was enabled the page just reloads at login. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/do4cKxs.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ZlV9ySI.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.53 Browser: | EdgeChromium Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | 1password, bombomb, honey, raindrop.io, todoist for gmail, tubebuddy

issue.title: flexiti.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://flexiti.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fflexiti.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @Batman2814 > So when Adguard for Windows is enabled I tried signing into my Flexiti Account. Still, it would not log in to me and got a message saying network connection issue as shown in the screenshot so I disabled Adguard for Windows and signed back into Flexiti I was able to sign in with no problem so this issue lies with Adguard for Windows. ### Screenshots
